longDesc:
Position - Research Analyst 
    Understanding the role of digital marketing in pharma brand building: Cases and Example. 
    Present a pre-campaign report of the strategies to be implemented. 
    Carryout online research of published cases /examples. 
    Presenting a final report to Brand Innerworld.

Duration – 30 days

Perks - L.O.R, Certificate

Interns Required - 2
name: Brand Innerworld
shortDesc: Brand Innerworld is a Pharma and Healthcare Brand Consultancy specializing in providing actionable strategic support to Creating and Building Brands from the world of Pharma, BioPharma, Life science and Healthcare business.
